ru.myx.ae3.console

Interface Console

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConsoleInput, ConsoleInteractive, ConsoleLogger, ConsoleOutput, java.io.Flushable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCharacterConsole, AbstractConsole, AbstractNoInputConsole, AbstractNonInteractiveConsole, ConsoleCollector, ConsoleLoggingWrapper, ConsoleNET, ConsolePrefixed, ConsoleSimple, ConsoleStdio, ConsoleStdoutNoInput, ConsoleTty

    public interface Console
extends ConsoleOutput, ConsoleInput, ConsoleLogger, ConsoleInteractive
    Author:
    myx

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      boolean isInteractive()
      Console is interactive when console's output can be used to communicate with the supplier of console's input.
      boolean isReadable()
      Console is readable when is has non-NULL and not yet closed ConsoleInput

      • Methods inherited from interface ru.myx.ae3.console.ConsoleOutput

        flush, sendMessage, sendMessage, setStateAttention, setStateError, setStateNormal

      • Methods inherited from interface ru.myx.ae3.console.ConsoleInput

        readBoolean, readBoolean, readChoose, readContinue, readInteger, readInteger, readPassword, readString

      • Methods inherited from interface ru.myx.ae3.console.ConsoleLogger

        debug, debug, error, error, info, info, log, log, warn, warn

      • Methods inherited from interface ru.myx.ae3.console.ConsoleInteractive

        checkUpdateClient, sendProgress

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()

      • isInteractive

        boolean isInteractive()
        Console is interactive when console's output can be used to communicate with the supplier of console's input.
        Returns:
        true when console is interactive

      • isReadable

        boolean isReadable()
        Console is readable when is has non-NULL and not yet closed ConsoleInput
        Returns:
        false when there are no [further] read operations to succeed
